stepAnswer: Ask colleagues, friends, etc., to tell you what they've learned from your presentation and see if that aligns with your intent
stepTitle: What is the most effective way to test your presentation?
choices: Ask colleagues, friends, etc., to give your presentation and ask yourself if it works
Ask colleagues, friends, etc., to tell you what they've learned from your presentation and see if that aligns with your intent
Ask colleagues, friends, etc., to review your presentation on a scale from $$0-5$$ across six dimensions
Ask colleagues, friends, etc., to tell you whether they like your presentation
